content.rendered:
This week in our weekly update we have fixed some old issues and brought in some new features. What are they? let’s find out.

What’s new:

The UI of the login and onboarding process has changed. Users can now login with

  • Magic link — No password mechanism
  • Twitter.
  • Gmail.
  • Web3 wallets, such as MetaMask, WalletConnect

Featural rearrangement of the metrics can help the product creator understand and analyze the data with a better view.

The latest advancements in the business logic for label creation in wallet profiling encompass the following:

  • Address activities: Users can now conveniently view a comprehensive breakdown of their asset holdings in native, stable, and unstable tokens.
  • Address profile: The criteria for user activity or interaction with any of the whitelisted decentralized applications (dApps) has been modified. A distinction has been introduced for light, elite, and heavy users of the primary dApps.

Bug Fixes:

  • Improvement in pricing screen.
  • Onboarding flow issues.
  • Wallet profiling pricing issue fixed
  • Technical documentation for integrations.

What’s Next:

  • Contract data scrapping enables users to view contract-related data right after providing contract detail.
  • Pricing Mechanism.

Spock needs your feedback to improve more. Visit spockanalytics.xyz and use our free interactable demo and provide us with your feedback at hello@spockanalytics.xyz.
